dialogue.text: Hi! Are you ready to order?
dialogue.zh:
嗨! 是 你 ready to 點餐?
こんにちは! Are あなた ready to 注文?

dialogue.text: Almost. I have a question first.
dialogue.zh:
Almost. 我 有 a question first.
Almost. 私 have a question first.

當然, what’s up?
もちろん, what’s up?

我’m allergic to peanuts.
私’m allergic to peanuts.

dialogue.text: Thanks for telling me. Are you okay with other nuts?
dialogue.zh:
謝謝 telling me. 是 你 好的 with other nuts?
ありがとう for telling me. Are あなた わかりました with other nuts?

是的, other nuts 是 fine.
はい, other nuts are fine.

dialogue.text: Do you also avoid seafood or dairy?
dialogue.zh:
你 also avoid seafood or dairy?
Do あなた also avoid seafood or dairy?

不, just peanuts.
いいえ, just peanuts.

This sauce may contain peanuts.
This sauce may contain peanuts.

好的, 我’ll avoid that.
わかりました, 私’ll avoid that.

dialogue.text: Would you like a different sauce?
dialogue.zh:
Would 你 like a different sauce?
Would あなた like a different sauce?

是的, what 你 recommend?
はい, what do あなた recommend?

dialogue.text: Our garlic butter sauce is safe.
dialogue.zh:
Our garlic butter sauce 是 safe.
Our garlic butter sauce 私 safe.

太好了, 我’ll choose that.
いいですね, 私’ll choose that.

dialogue.text: What would you like for your main dish?
dialogue.zh:
What would 你 like your main dish?
What would あなた like for your main dish?

我’ll 有 the grilled chicken.
私’ll have the grilled chicken.

dialogue.text: How would you like it cooked?
dialogue.zh:
How would 你 like it cooked?
How would あなた like it cooked?

Well done, 請.
Well done, お願いします.

任何 side dishes?
Any side dishes?

A salad, 請.
A salad, お願いします.

What dressing would 你 like?
What dressing would あなた like?

Italian dressing.
Italian dressing.

Anything to drink?
Anything to drink?

Still 水, 請.
Still 水, お願いします.

Would 你 like bread?
Would あなた like bread?

是的, but 不 peanut butter.
はい, but いいえ peanut butter.

dialogue.text: Of course. I’ll note the allergy.
dialogue.zh:
Of course. 我’ll note the 過敏.
Of course. 私’ll note the アレルギー.

謝謝 你 being careful.
ありがとう あなた for being careful.

dialogue.text: No problem. I’ll put that in now.
dialogue.zh:
不 problem. 我’ll put that in now.
いいえ problem. 私’ll put that in now.

謝謝.
ありがとう.
